projectGridLines.stationName: Aarrrmor Digital Services Pvt. Ltd. (Non IT),Bengaluru
projectGridLines.title: Project 1: Bumshum – A sustainable baby brand; Project 2: Bengaluru Police Project
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Bumshum – A sustainable baby brand

Description: Bumshum is the first wooden toy shop, with a wide range of “Play It Safe” Toy collection.Along with organic clothing, wholegrain snacks, books and a lot of eco-friendly baby essentials

Skill sets:  Digital Marketing, Data Analysis

Traits expectation: Data Driven, Creative, Quick Learner

Expected learning: Digital Marketing, Online Sales, Product Launch

Specific courses required for project execution: None, any marketing internship/course would be a bonus


Project 2

Title: Bengaluru Police Project

Description: Kannada Video Editor

Skill sets: Video Editing, Kannada Spoken Language

Traits expectation: Journalism Bent of mind, coverage of events, video aesthetics

Expected learning: Video shooting, Video editing

Specific courses required for project execution: None, any video internship/course/interest would be a bonus
